        public static boolean accountExists(java.lang.String account)
        Check if an account exists or not using the net user command
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getAccountProperty

        public static java.lang.String getAccountProperty(java.lang.String account,
                                  java.lang.String property)
        Get an account property output from the net user command
        Parameters:
        account - The account to check
        property - The property to retrieve
        Returns:
        The value of the given property, or empty string if there was an error

        Returns:
